com.example.yanghanwen.taskmanagementmonster

Class DetailTaskModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.yanghanwen.taskmanagementmonster.DetailTaskModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DetailTaskProviderModel, DetailTaskRequestorModel, DetailTaskSearchModel

    public abstract class DetailTaskModel
extends java.lang.Object
    MVC model for the Detail task activity, compute and return required data.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Task task 
      protected java.lang.String username 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DetailTaskModel(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String requester)
      Construct a model instance for the DetailTaskActivity The task will get by elastic search by using the input parameter title and requester to search for the corresponding task.

        protected java.lang.String username

        protected Task task

    • Constructor Detail

      • DetailTaskModel

        public DetailTaskModel(java.lang.String title,
                       java.lang.String requester)
        Construct a model instance for the DetailTaskActivity The task will get by elastic search by using the input parameter title and requester to search for the corresponding task. The username will be get by using the MainActivity's method.
        Parameters:
        title - the title / taskname of task that need show detail information
        requester - the username of user who is the requester of the task

    • Method Detail

      • getBidInfo

        public abstract java.lang.String getBidInfo()
        Get the string showed on detailBidInformation TextView of activity_detail_task. Depend on the subclass to provided the required output string. This string will be used to describe the lowest bid of the current bid or the detail information about the current bid, such as this task has no bid.
        Returns:
        String showed on detailBidInformation TextView

      • getBidLowest

        public abstract java.lang.String getBidLowest()
        Get the string showed on detailBidLowest TextView of activity_detail_task Depend on the subclass to provided the required output string. This string generally provide the lowest amount of the current bid.
        Returns:
        String showed on detailBidLowest TextView

      • getMyBidInfo

        public abstract java.lang.String getMyBidInfo()
        Get the string showed on detailMyBid TextView of activity_detail_task Depend on the subclass to provided the required output string. This string generally describe the information about the current user's bid on the task that are currently viewed.
        Returns:
        String showed on detailMyBid TextView

      • getMyBid

        public abstract java.lang.String getMyBid()
        Get the string showed on viewDetailMyBid TextView of activity_detail_task Depend on the subclass to provided the required output string. This string generally describe the information about the current user's bid of this task.
        Returns:
        String showed on viewDetailMyBid TextView

      • getBidsList

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<Bid> getBidsList()
        Return the Arraylist contain all the bid Object of the bid on this task. This method is proved to the requester when the task is in the bidded status. This method is used to print all the bids of this task on a ListView for the requester to further operated on.
        Returns:
        ArrayList contain all Bid object related to this task

      • getButtonText1

        public abstract java.lang.String getButtonText1()
        Return the text showed on the buttonDetail Depend on the subclass to provided the required output text. This button is generally used to modify / assigned / bidded or other 'positive' action on the current task.
        Returns:
        Text showed on the buttonDetail

      • getButtonText2

        public abstract java.lang.String getButtonText2()
        Return the text showed on the buttonDetail2 Depend on the subclass to provided the required output text. This button is generally used to decline or delete other 'negative' action on the current task.
        Returns:
        Text showed on the buttonDetail2
